name: BAD_REQUEST
description: The query contains errors. In the event that a request was created using a form and contains user generated data, the user should be notified that the data must be corrected before the query is repeated

name: UNAUTHORIZED
description: There was an unauthorized attempt to use functionality available only to authorized users.

name: FORBIDDEN
description: Privacy violation. For example, an attempt to write a message to someone who has blacklisted the current user.

name: NOT_FOUND
description: An attempt to invoke a non-existent object, such as a method.

name: FLOOD
description: The maximum allowed number of attempts to invoke the given methodwith the given input parameters has been exceeded. For example, in anattempt to request a large number of text messages (SMS) for the samephone number.

name: SEE_OTHER
description: The request must be repeated, but directed to a different data center

name: NOT_ACCEPTABLE
description: Similar to 400 BAD_REQUEST, but the app should not display any error messages to user in UI as a result of this response. The error message will be delivered via updateServiceNotification instead.

name: INTERNAL
description: An internal server error occurred while a request was being processed; for example, there was a disruption while accessing a database or file storage.

name: 2FA_CONFIRM_WAIT_X
description: The account is 2FA protected so it will be deleted in a week. Otherwise it can be reset in {seconds}

name: ABOUT_TOO_LONG
description: The provided bio is too long

name: ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRED
description: Bot token expired

name: ACCESS_TOKEN_INVALID
description: The provided token is not valid

name: ACTIVE_USER_REQUIRED
description: The method is only available to already activated users

name: ADMINS_TOO_MUCH
description: Too many admins

name: ADMIN_RANK_EMOJI_NOT_ALLOWED
description: Emoji are not allowed in admin titles or ranks

name: ADMIN_RANK_INVALID
description: The given admin title or rank was invalid (possibly larger than 16 characters)

name: ALBUM_PHOTOS_TOO_MANY
description: Too many photos were included in the album

name: API_ID_INVALID
description: The api_id/api_hash combination is invalid

name: API_ID_PUBLISHED_FLOOD
description: This API id was published somewhere, you can't use it now

name: ARTICLE_TITLE_EMPTY
description: The title of the article is empty

name: AUDIO_TITLE_EMPTY
description: The title attribute of the audio must be non-empty

name: AUTH_BYTES_INVALID
description: The provided authorization is invalid

name: AUTH_KEY_DUPLICATED
description: The authorization key (session file) was used under two different IP addresses simultaneously, and can no longer be used. Use the same session exclusively, or use different sessions

name: AUTH_KEY_INVALID
description: The key is invalid

name: AUTH_KEY_PERM_EMPTY
description: The method is unavailable for temporary authorization key, not bound to permanent

name: AUTH_KEY_UNREGISTERED
description: The key is not registered in the system

name: AUTH_RESTART
description: Restart the authorization process

name: AUTH_TOKEN_ALREADY_ACCEPTED
description: The authorization token was already used

name: AUTH_TOKEN_EXPIRED
description: The provided authorization token has expired and the updated QR-code must be re-scanned

name: AUTH_TOKEN_INVALID
description: An invalid authorization token was provided

name: AUTOARCHIVE_NOT_AVAILABLE
description: You cannot use this feature yet

name: BANK_CARD_NUMBER_INVALID
description: Incorrect credit card number

name: BASE_PORT_LOC_INVALID
description: Base port location invalid

name: BANNED_RIGHTS_INVALID
description: You cannot use that set of permissions in this request, i.e. restricting view_messages as a default

name: BOTS_TOO_MUCH
description: There are too many bots in this chat/channel

name: BOT_CHANNELS_NA
description: Bots can't edit admin privileges

name: BOT_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION_INVALID
description: The command description was empty, too long or had invalid characters used

name: BOT_DOMAIN_INVALID
description: The domain used for the auth button does not match the one configured in @BotFather

name: BOT_GAMES_DISABLED
description: Bot games cannot be used in this type of chat

name: BOT_GROUPS_BLOCKED
description: This bot can't be added to groups

name: BOT_INLINE_DISABLED
description: This bot can't be used in inline mode

name: BOT_INVALID
description: This is not a valid bot

name: BOT_METHOD_INVALID
description: The API access for bot users is restricted. The method you tried to invoke cannot be executed as a bot

name: BOT_MISSING
description: This method can only be run by a bot

name: BOT_PAYMENTS_DISABLED
description: This method can only be run by a bot

name: BOT_POLLS_DISABLED
description: You cannot create polls under a bot account

name: BOT_RESPONSE_TIMEOUT
description: The bot did not answer to the callback query in time

name: BROADCAST_FORBIDDEN
description: The request cannot be used in broadcast channels

name: BROADCAST_ID_INVALID
description: The channel is invalid

name: BROADCAST_PUBLIC_VOTERS_FORBIDDEN
description: You cannot broadcast polls where the voters are public

name: BROADCAST_REQUIRED
description: The request can only be used with a broadcast channel

name: BUTTON_DATA_INVALID
description: The provided button data is invalid

name: BUTTON_TYPE_INVALID
description: The type of one of the buttons you provided is invalid

name: BUTTON_URL_INVALID
description: Button URL invalid

name: CALL_ALREADY_ACCEPTED
description: The call was already accepted

name: CALL_ALREADY_DECLINED
description: The call was already declined

name: CALL_OCCUPY_FAILED
description: The call failed because the user is already making another call

name: CALL_PEER_INVALID
description: The provided call peer object is invalid

name: CALL_PROTOCOL_FLAGS_INVALID
description: Call protocol flags invalid

name: CDN_METHOD_INVALID
description: This method cannot be invoked on a CDN server. Refer to https://core.telegram.org/cdn#schema for available methods

name: CHANNELS_ADMIN_PUBLIC_TOO_MUCH
description: You're admin of too many public channels, make some channels private to change the username of this channel

name: CHANNELS_TOO_MUCH
description: You have joined too many channels/supergroups

name: CHANNEL_BANNED
description: The channel is banned

name: CHANNEL_INVALID
description: Invalid channel object. Make sure to pass the right types, for instance making sure that the request is designed for channels or otherwise look for a different one more suited

name: CHANNEL_PRIVATE
description: The channel specified is private and you lack permission to access it. Another reason may be that you were banned from it

name: CHANNEL_PUBLIC_GROUP_NA
description: channel/supergroup not available

name: CHAT_ABOUT_NOT_MODIFIED
description: About text has not changed

name: CHAT_ABOUT_TOO_LONG
description: Chat about too long

name: CHAT_ADMIN_INVITE_REQUIRED
description: You do not have the rights to do this

name: CHAT_ADMIN_REQUIRED
description: Chat admin privileges are required to do that in the specified chat (for example, to send a message in a channel which is not yours), or invalid permissions used for the channel or group

name: CHAT_FORBIDDEN
description: You cannot write in this chat

name: CHAT_ID_EMPTY
description: The provided chat ID is empty

name: CHAT_ID_INVALID
description: Invalid object ID for a chat. Make sure to pass the right types, for instance making sure that the request is designed for chats (not channels/megagroups) or otherwise look for a different one more suited\nAn example working with a megagroup and AddChatUserRequest, it will fail because megagroups are channels. Use InviteToChannelRequest instead

name: CHAT_INVALID
description: The chat is invalid for this request

name: CHAT_LINK_EXISTS
description: The chat is linked to a channel and cannot be used in that request

name: CHAT_NOT_MODIFIED
description: The chat or channel wasn't modified (title, invites, username, admins, etc. are the same)

name: CHAT_RESTRICTED
description: The chat is restricted and cannot be used in that request

name: CHAT_SEND_GIFS_FORBIDDEN
description: You can't send gifs in this chat

name: CHAT_SEND_INLINE_FORBIDDEN
description: You cannot send inline results in this chat

name: CHAT_SEND_MEDIA_FORBIDDEN
description: You can't send media in this chat

name: CHAT_SEND_STICKERS_FORBIDDEN
description: You can't send stickers in this chat

name: CHAT_TITLE_EMPTY
description: No chat title provided

name: CHAT_WRITE_FORBIDDEN
description: You can't write in this chat

name: CHP_CALL_FAIL
description: The statistics cannot be retrieved at this time

name: CODE_EMPTY
description: The provided code is empty

name: CODE_HASH_INVALID
description: Code hash invalid

name: CODE_INVALID
description: Code invalid (i.e. from email)

name: CONNECTION_API_ID_INVALID
description: The provided API id is invalid

name: CONNECTION_DEVICE_MODEL_EMPTY
description: Device model empty

name: CONNECTION_LANG_PACK_INVALID
description: The specified language pack is not valid. This is meant to be used by official applications only so far, leave it empty

name: CONNECTION_LAYER_INVALID
description: The very first request must always be InvokeWithLayerRequest

name: CONNECTION_NOT_INITED
description: Connection not initialized

name: CONNECTION_SYSTEM_EMPTY
description: Connection system empty

name: CONNECTION_SYSTEM_LANG_CODE_EMPTY
description: The system language string was empty during connection

name: CONTACT_ID_INVALID
description: The provided contact ID is invalid

name: CONTACT_NAME_EMPTY
description: The provided contact name cannot be empty

name: DATA_INVALID
description: Encrypted data invalid

name: DATA_JSON_INVALID
description: The provided JSON data is invalid

name: DATE_EMPTY
description: Date empty

name: DC_ID_INVALID
description: This occurs when an authorization is tried to be exported for the same data center one is currently connected to

name: DH_G_A_INVALID
description: g_a invalid

name: DOCUMENT_INVALID
description: The document file was invalid and can't be used in inline mode

name: EMAIL_HASH_EXPIRED
description: The email hash expired and cannot be used to verify it

name: EMAIL_INVALID
description: The given email is invalid

name: EMAIL_UNCONFIRMED_X
description: Email unconfirmed, the length of the code must be {code_length}

name: EMOTICON_EMPTY
description: The emoticon field cannot be empty

name: EMOTICON_INVALID
description: The specified emoticon cannot be used or was not a emoticon

name: EMOTICON_STICKERPACK_MISSING
description: The emoticon sticker pack you are trying to get is missing

name: ENCRYPTED_MESSAGE_INVALID
description: Encrypted message invalid

name: ENCRYPTION_ALREADY_ACCEPTED
description: Secret chat already accepted

name: ENCRYPTION_ALREADY_DECLINED
description: The secret chat was already declined

name: ENCRYPTION_DECLINED
description: The secret chat was declined

name: ENCRYPTION_ID_INVALID
description: The provided secret chat ID is invalid

name: ENCRYPTION_OCCUPY_FAILED
description: TDLib developer claimed it is not an error while accepting secret chats and 500 is used instead of 420

name: ENTITIES_TOO_LONG
description: It is no longer possible to send such long data inside entity tags (for example inline text URLs)

name: ENTITY_MENTION_USER_INVALID
description: You can't use this entity

name: ERROR_TEXT_EMPTY
description: The provided error message is empty

name: EXPORT_CARD_INVALID
description: Provided card is invalid

name: EXTERNAL_URL_INVALID
description: External URL invalid

name: FIELD_NAME_EMPTY
description: The field with the name FIELD_NAME is missing

name: FIELD_NAME_INVALID
description: The field with the name FIELD_NAME is invalid

name: FILEREF_UPGRADE_NEEDED
description: The file reference needs to be refreshed before being used again

name: FILE_ID_INVALID
description: The provided file id is invalid. Make sure all parameters are present, have the correct type and are not empty (ID, access hash, file reference, thumb size ...)

name: FILE_MIGRATE_X
description: The file to be accessed is currently stored in DC {new_dc}

name: FILE_PARTS_INVALID
description: The number of file parts is invalid

name: FILE_PART_0_MISSING
description: File part 0 missing

name: FILE_PART_EMPTY
description: The provided file part is empty

name: FILE_PART_INVALID
description: The file part number is invalid

name: FILE_PART_LENGTH_INVALID
description: The length of a file part is invalid

name: FILE_PART_SIZE_CHANGED
description: The file part size (chunk size) cannot change during upload

name: FILE_PART_SIZE_INVALID
description: The provided file part size is invalid

name: FILE_PART_X_MISSING
description: Part {which} of the file is missing from storage

name: FILE_REFERENCE_EMPTY
description: The file reference must exist to access the media and it cannot be empty

name: FILE_REFERENCE_EXPIRED
description: The file reference has expired and is no longer valid or it belongs to self-destructing media and cannot be resent

name: FILE_REFERENCE_INVALID
description: The file reference is invalid or you can't do that operation on such message

name: FIRSTNAME_INVALID
description: The first name is invalid

name: FLOOD_TEST_PHONE_WAIT_X
description: A wait of {seconds} seconds is required in the test servers

name: FLOOD_WAIT_X
description: A wait of {seconds} seconds is required

name: FOLDER_ID_EMPTY
description: The folder you tried to delete was already empty

name: FOLDER_ID_INVALID
description: The folder you tried to use was not valid

name: FRESH_CHANGE_ADMINS_FORBIDDEN
description: Recently logged-in users cannot add or change admins

name: FRESH_CHANGE_PHONE_FORBIDDEN
description: Recently logged-in users cannot use this request

name: FRESH_RESET_AUTHORISATION_FORBIDDEN
description: The current session is too new and cannot be used to reset other authorisations yet

name: FROM_PEER_INVALID
description: The given from_user peer cannot be used for the parameter

name: GAME_BOT_INVALID
description: You cannot send that game with the current bot

name: GIF_ID_INVALID
description: The provided GIF ID is invalid

name: GRAPH_OUTDATED_RELOAD
description: Data can't be used for the channel statistics, graphs outdated

name: GROUPED_MEDIA_INVALID
description: Invalid grouped media

name: GROUP_CALL_INVALID
description: Group call invalid

name: HASH_INVALID
description: The provided hash is invalid

name: HISTORY_GET_FAILED
description: Fetching of history failed

name: IMAGE_PROCESS_FAILED
description: Failure while processing image

name: IMPORT_FILE_INVALID
description: The file is too large to be imported

name: IMPORT_FORMAT_UNRECOGNIZED
description: Unknown import format

name: INLINE_BOT_REQUIRED
description: The action must be performed through an inline bot callback

name: INLINE_RESULT_EXPIRED
description: The inline query expired

name: INPUT_CONSTRUCTOR_INVALID
description: The provided constructor is invalid

name: INPUT_FETCH_ERROR
description: An error occurred while deserializing TL parameters

name: INPUT_FETCH_FAIL
description: Failed deserializing TL payload

name: INPUT_FILTER_INVALID
description: The search query filter is invalid

name: INPUT_LAYER_INVALID
description: The provided layer is invalid

name: INPUT_METHOD_INVALID
description: The invoked method does not exist anymore or has never existed

name: INPUT_REQUEST_TOO_LONG
description: The input request was too long. This may be a bug in the library as it can occur when serializing more bytes than it should (like appending the vector constructor code at the end of a message)

name: INPUT_USER_DEACTIVATED
description: The specified user was deleted

name: INTERDC_X_CALL_ERROR
description: An error occurred while communicating with DC {dc}

name: INTERDC_X_CALL_RICH_ERROR
description: A rich error occurred while communicating with DC {dc}

name: INVITE_HASH_EMPTY
description: The invite hash is empty

name: INVITE_HASH_EXPIRED
description: The chat the user tried to join has expired and is not valid anymore

name: INVITE_HASH_INVALID
description: The invite hash is invalid

name: LANG_PACK_INVALID
description: The provided language pack is invalid

name: LASTNAME_INVALID
description: The last name is invalid

name: LIMIT_INVALID
description: An invalid limit was provided. See https://core.telegram.org/api/files#downloading-files

name: LINK_NOT_MODIFIED
description: The channel is already linked to this group

name: LOCATION_INVALID
description: The location given for a file was invalid. See https://core.telegram.org/api/files#downloading-files

name: MAX_ID_INVALID
description: The provided max ID is invalid

name: MAX_QTS_INVALID
description: The provided QTS were invalid

name: MD5_CHECKSUM_INVALID
description: The MD5 check-sums do not match

name: MEDIA_CAPTION_TOO_LONG
description: The caption is too long

name: MEDIA_EMPTY
description: The provided media object is invalid or the current account may not be able to send it (such as games as users)

name: MEDIA_INVALID
description: Media invalid

name: MEDIA_NEW_INVALID
description: The new media to edit the message with is invalid (such as stickers or voice notes)

name: MEDIA_PREV_INVALID
description: The old media cannot be edited with anything else (such as stickers or voice notes)

name: MEGAGROUP_ID_INVALID
description: The group is invalid

name: MEGAGROUP_PREHISTORY_HIDDEN
description: You can't set this discussion group because it's history is hidden

name: MEGAGROUP_REQUIRED
description: The request can only be used with a megagroup channel

name: MEMBER_NO_LOCATION
description: An internal failure occurred while fetching user info (couldn't find location)

name: MEMBER_OCCUPY_PRIMARY_LOC_FAILED
description: Occupation of primary member location failed

name: MESSAGE_AUTHOR_REQUIRED
description: Message author required

name: MESSAGE_DELETE_FORBIDDEN
description: You can't delete one of the messages you tried to delete, most likely because it is a service message.

name: MESSAGE_EDIT_TIME_EXPIRED
description: You can't edit this message anymore, too much time has passed since its creation.

name: MESSAGE_EMPTY
description: Empty or invalid UTF-8 message was sent

name: MESSAGE_IDS_EMPTY
description: No message ids were provided

name: MESSAGE_ID_INVALID
description: The specified message ID is invalid or you can't do that operation on such message

name: MESSAGE_NOT_MODIFIED
description: Content of the message was not modified

name: MESSAGE_POLL_CLOSED
description: The poll was closed and can no longer be voted on

name: MESSAGE_TOO_LONG
description: Message was too long. Current maximum length is 4096 UTF-8 characters

name: METHOD_INVALID
description: The API method is invalid and cannot be used

name: MSGID_DECREASE_RETRY
description: The request should be retried with a lower message ID

name: MSG_ID_INVALID
description: The message ID used in the peer was invalid

name: MSG_WAIT_FAILED
description: A waiting call returned an error

name: MULTI_MEDIA_TOO_LONG
description: Too many media files were included in the same album

name: NEED_CHAT_INVALID
description: The provided chat is invalid

name: NEED_MEMBER_INVALID
description: The provided member is invalid or does not exist (for example a thumb size)

name: NETWORK_MIGRATE_X
description: The source IP address is associated with DC {new_dc}

name: NEW_SALT_INVALID
description: The new salt is invalid

name: NEW_SETTINGS_INVALID
description: The new settings are invalid

name: NEXT_OFFSET_INVALID
description: The value for next_offset is invalid. Check that it has normal characters and is not too long

name: OFFSET_INVALID
description: The given offset was invalid, it must be divisible by 1KB. See https://core.telegram.org/api/files#downloading-files

name: OFFSET_PEER_ID_INVALID
description: The provided offset peer is invalid

name: OPTIONS_TOO_MUCH
description: You defined too many options for the poll

name: OPTION_INVALID
description: The option specified is invalid and does not exist in the target poll

name: PACK_SHORT_NAME_INVALID
description: Invalid sticker pack name. It must begin with a letter, can't contain consecutive underscores and must end in "_by_<bot username>".

name: PACK_SHORT_NAME_OCCUPIED
description: A stickerpack with this name already exists

name: PARTICIPANTS_TOO_FEW
description: Not enough participants

name: PARTICIPANT_CALL_FAILED
description: Failure while making call

name: PARTICIPANT_VERSION_OUTDATED
description: The other participant does not use an up to date telegram client with support for calls

name: PASSWORD_EMPTY
description: The provided password is empty

name: PASSWORD_HASH_INVALID
description: The password (and thus its hash value) you entered is invalid

name: PASSWORD_MISSING
description: The account must have 2-factor authentication enabled (a password) before this method can be used

name: PASSWORD_REQUIRED
description: The account must have 2-factor authentication enabled (a password) before this method can be used

name: PASSWORD_TOO_FRESH_X
description: The password was added too recently and {seconds} seconds must pass before using the method

name: PAYMENT_PROVIDER_INVALID
description: The payment provider was not recognised or its token was invalid

name: PEER_FLOOD
description: Too many requests

name: PEER_ID_INVALID
description: An invalid Peer was used. Make sure to pass the right peer type and that the value is valid (for instance, bots cannot start conversations)

name: PEER_ID_NOT_SUPPORTED
description: The provided peer ID is not supported

name: PERSISTENT_TIMESTAMP_EMPTY
description: Persistent timestamp empty

name: PERSISTENT_TIMESTAMP_INVALID
description: Persistent timestamp invalid

name: PERSISTENT_TIMESTAMP_OUTDATED
description: Persistent timestamp outdated

name: PHONE_CODE_EMPTY
description: The phone code is missing

name: PHONE_CODE_EXPIRED
description: The confirmation code has expired

name: PHONE_CODE_HASH_EMPTY
description: The phone code hash is missing

name: PHONE_CODE_INVALID
description: The phone code entered was invalid

name: PHONE_MIGRATE_X
description: The phone number a user is trying to use for authorization is associated with DC {new_dc}

name: PHONE_NUMBER_APP_SIGNUP_FORBIDDEN
description: You can't sign up using this app

name: PHONE_NUMBER_BANNED
description: The used phone number has been banned from Telegram and cannot be used anymore. Maybe check https://www.telegram.org/faq_spam

name: PHONE_NUMBER_FLOOD
description: You asked for the code too many times.

name: PHONE_NUMBER_INVALID
description: The phone number is invalid

name: PHONE_NUMBER_OCCUPIED
description: The phone number is already in use

name: PHONE_NUMBER_UNOCCUPIED
description: The phone number is not yet being used

name: PHONE_PASSWORD_FLOOD
description: You have tried logging in too many times

name: PHONE_PASSWORD_PROTECTED
description: This phone is password protected

name: PHOTO_CONTENT_URL_EMPTY
description: The content from the URL used as a photo appears to be empty or has caused another HTTP error

name: PHOTO_CROP_SIZE_SMALL
description: Photo is too small

name: PHOTO_EXT_INVALID
description: The extension of the photo is invalid

name: PHOTO_ID_INVALID
description: Photo id is invalid

name: PHOTO_INVALID
description: Photo invalid

name: PHOTO_INVALID_DIMENSIONS
description: The photo dimensions are invalid (hint: `pip install pillow` for `send_file` to resize images)

name: PHOTO_SAVE_FILE_INVALID
description: The photo you tried to send cannot be saved by Telegram. A reason may be that it exceeds 10MB. Try resizing it locally

name: PHOTO_THUMB_URL_EMPTY
description: The URL used as a thumbnail appears to be empty or has caused another HTTP error

name: PIN_RESTRICTED
description: You can't pin messages in private chats with other people

name: POLL_ANSWERS_INVALID
description: The poll did not have enough answers or had too many

name: POLL_OPTION_DUPLICATE
description: A duplicate option was sent in the same poll

name: POLL_OPTION_INVALID
description: A poll option used invalid data (the data may be too long)

name: POLL_QUESTION_INVALID
description: The poll question was either empty or too long

name: POLL_UNSUPPORTED
description: This layer does not support polls in the issued method

name: PREVIOUS_CHAT_IMPORT_ACTIVE_WAIT_XMIN
description: Similar to a flood wait, must wait {minutes} minutes

name: PRIVACY_KEY_INVALID
description: The privacy key is invalid

name: PRIVACY_TOO_LONG
description: Cannot add that many entities in a single request

name: PRIVACY_VALUE_INVALID
description: The privacy value is invalid

name: PTS_CHANGE_EMPTY
description: No PTS change

name: QUERY_ID_EMPTY
description: The query ID is empty

name: QUERY_ID_INVALID
description: The query ID is invalid

name: QUERY_TOO_SHORT
description: The query string is too short

name: QUIZ_CORRECT_ANSWERS_EMPTY

description: There can only be one correct answer

name: QUIZ_CORRECT_ANSWER_INVALID
description: The correct answer is not an existing answer

name: QUIZ_MULTIPLE_INVALID

name: RANDOM_ID_DUPLICATE
description: You provided a random ID that was already used

name: RANDOM_ID_INVALID
description: A provided random ID is invalid

name: RANDOM_LENGTH_INVALID
description: Random length invalid

name: RANGES_INVALID
description: Invalid range provided

name: REACTION_EMPTY
description: No reaction provided

name: REACTION_INVALID
description: Invalid reaction provided (only emoji are allowed)

name: REFLECTOR_NOT_AVAILABLE
description: Invalid call reflector server

name: REG_ID_GENERATE_FAILED
description: Failure while generating registration ID

name: REPLY_MARKUP_GAME_EMPTY
description: The provided reply markup for the game is empty

name: REPLY_MARKUP_INVALID
description: The provided reply markup is invalid

name: REPLY_MARKUP_TOO_LONG
description: The data embedded in the reply markup buttons was too much

name: RESULTS_TOO_MUCH
description: You sent too many results, see https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#answerinlinequery for the current limit

name: RESULT_ID_DUPLICATE
description: Duplicated IDs on the sent results. Make sure to use unique IDs

name: RESULT_ID_INVALID
description: The given result cannot be used to send the selection to the bot

name: RESULT_TYPE_INVALID
description: Result type invalid

name: RIGHT_FORBIDDEN
description: Either your admin rights do not allow you to do this or you passed the wrong rights combination (some rights only apply to channels and vice versa)

name: RPC_CALL_FAIL
description: Telegram is having internal issues, please try again later.

name: RPC_MCGET_FAIL
description: Telegram is having internal issues, please try again later.

name: RSA_DECRYPT_FAILED
description: Internal RSA decryption failed

name: SCHEDULE_BOT_NOT_ALLOWED
description: Bots are not allowed to schedule messages

name: SCHEDULE_DATE_TOO_LATE

name: SCHEDULE_STATUS_PRIVATE

name: SCHEDULE_TOO_MUCH
description: You cannot schedule more messages in this chat (last known limit of 100 per chat)

name: SEARCH_QUERY_EMPTY
description: The search query is empty

name: SECONDS_INVALID

name: SEND_MESSAGE_MEDIA_INVALID
description: The message media was invalid or not specified

name: SEND_MESSAGE_TYPE_INVALID
description: The message type is invalid

name: SENSITIVE_CHANGE_FORBIDDEN
description: Your sensitive content settings cannot be changed at this time

name: SESSION_EXPIRED
description: The authorization has expired

name: SESSION_PASSWORD_NEEDED
description: Two-steps verification is enabled and a password is required

name: SESSION_REVOKED

name: SESSION_TOO_FRESH_X
description: The session logged in too recently and {seconds} seconds must pass before calling the method

name: SHA256_HASH_INVALID
description: The provided SHA256 hash is invalid

name: SHORTNAME_OCCUPY_FAILED
description: An error occurred when trying to register the short-name used for the sticker pack. Try a different name

name: SLOWMODE_WAIT_X

name: START_PARAM_EMPTY
description: The start parameter is empty

name: START_PARAM_INVALID
description: Start parameter invalid

name: STATS_MIGRATE_X
description: The channel statistics must be fetched from DC {dc}

name: STICKERSET_INVALID
description: The provided sticker set is invalid

name: STICKERSET_OWNER_ANONYMOUS
description: This sticker set can't be used as the group's official stickers because it was created by one of its anonymous admins

name: STICKERS_EMPTY
description: No sticker provided

name: STICKER_DOCUMENT_INVALID
description: The sticker file was invalid (this file has failed Telegram internal checks, make sure to use the correct format and comply with https://core.telegram.org/animated_stickers)

name: STICKER_EMOJI_INVALID
description: Sticker emoji invalid

name: STICKER_FILE_INVALID
description: Sticker file invalid

name: STICKER_ID_INVALID
description: The provided sticker ID is invalid

name: STICKER_INVALID
description: The provided sticker is invalid

name: STICKER_PNG_DIMENSIONS
description: Sticker png dimensions invalid

name: STICKER_PNG_NOPNG
description: Stickers must be a png file but the used image was not a png

name: STICKER_TGS_NOTGS
description: Stickers must be a tgs file but the used file was not a tgs

name: STICKER_THUMB_PNG_NOPNG
description: Stickerset thumb must be a png file but the used file was not png

name: STICKER_THUMB_TGS_NOTGS
description: Stickerset thumb must be a tgs file but the used file was not tgs

name: STORAGE_CHECK_FAILED
description: Server storage check failed

name: TAKEOUT_INIT_DELAY_X
description: A wait of {seconds} seconds is required before being able to initiate the takeout

name: TAKEOUT_INVALID
description: The takeout session has been invalidated by another data export session

name: TAKEOUT_REQUIRED
description: You must initialize a takeout request first

name: TEMP_AUTH_KEY_EMPTY
description: No temporary auth key provided

name: TIMEOUT
description: A timeout occurred while fetching data from the worker

name: THEME_INVALID
description: Theme invalid

name: THEME_MIME_INVALID
description: You cannot create this theme, the mime-type is invalid

name: TMP_PASSWORD_DISABLED
description: The temporary password is disabled

name: TMP_PASSWORD_INVALID
description: Password auth needs to be regenerated

name: TOKEN_INVALID
description: The provided token is invalid

name: TTL_DAYS_INVALID
description: The provided TTL is invalid

name: TTL_PERIOD_INVALID
description: The provided TTL Period is invalid

name: TYPES_EMPTY
description: The types field is empty

name: TYPE_CONSTRUCTOR_INVALID
description: The type constructor is invalid

name: UNKNOWN_METHOD
description: The method you tried to call cannot be called on non-CDN DCs

name: UNTIL_DATE_INVALID
description: That date cannot be specified in this request (try using None)

name: URL_INVALID
description: The URL used was invalid (e.g. when answering a callback with a URL that's not t.me/yourbot or your game's URL)

name: USERNAME_INVALID
description: Nobody is using this username, or the username is unacceptable. If the latter, it must match r"[a-zA-Z][\w\d]{3,30}[a-zA-Z\d]"

name: USERNAME_NOT_MODIFIED
description: The username is not different from the current username

name: USERNAME_NOT_OCCUPIED
description: The username is not in use by anyone else yet

name: USERNAME_OCCUPIED
description: The username is already taken

name: USERS_TOO_FEW
description: Not enough users (to create a chat, for example)

name: USERS_TOO_MUCH
description: The maximum number of users has been exceeded (to create a chat, for example)

name: USER_ADMIN_INVALID
description: Either you're not an admin or you tried to ban an admin that you didn't promote

name: USER_ALREADY_PARTICIPANT
description: The authenticated user is already a participant of the chat

name: USER_BANNED_IN_CHANNEL
description: You're banned from sending messages in supergroups/channels

name: USER_BLOCKED
description: User blocked

name: USER_BOT
description: Bots can only be admins in channels.

name: USER_BOT_INVALID
description: This method can only be called by a bot

name: USER_BOT_REQUIRED
description: This method can only be called by a bot

name: USER_CHANNELS_TOO_MUCH
description: One of the users you tried to add is already in too many channels/supergroups

name: USER_CREATOR
description: You can't leave this channel, because you're its creator

name: USER_DEACTIVATED
description: The user has been deleted/deactivated

name: USER_DEACTIVATED_BAN
description: The user has been deleted/deactivated

name: USER_ID_INVALID
description: Invalid object ID for a user. Make sure to pass the right types, for instance making sure that the request is designed for users or otherwise look for a different one more suited

name: USER_INVALID
description: The given user was invalid

name: USER_IS_BLOCKED
description: User is blocked

name: USER_IS_BOT
description: Bots can't send messages to other bots

name: USER_KICKED
description: This user was kicked from this supergroup/channel

name: USER_MIGRATE_X
description: The user whose identity is being used to execute queries is associated with DC {new_dc}

name: USER_NOT_MUTUAL_CONTACT
description: The provided user is not a mutual contact

name: USER_NOT_PARTICIPANT
description: The target user is not a member of the specified megagroup or channel

name: USER_PRIVACY_RESTRICTED
description: The user's privacy settings do not allow you to do this

name: USER_RESTRICTED
description: You're spamreported, you can't create channels or chats.

name: USERPIC_UPLOAD_REQUIRED
description: You must have a profile picture before using this method

name: VIDEO_CONTENT_TYPE_INVALID
description: The video content type is not supported with the given parameters (i.e. supports_streaming)

name: VIDEO_FILE_INVALID
description: The given video cannot be used

name: WALLPAPER_FILE_INVALID
description: The given file cannot be used as a wallpaper

name: WALLPAPER_INVALID
description: The input wallpaper was not valid

name: WC_CONVERT_URL_INVALID
description: WC convert URL invalid

name: WEBDOCUMENT_URL_INVALID
description: The given URL cannot be used

name: WEBPAGE_CURL_FAILED
description: Failure while fetching the webpage with cURL

name: WEBPAGE_MEDIA_EMPTY
description: Webpage media empty

name: WORKER_BUSY_TOO_LONG_RETRY
description: Telegram workers are too busy to respond immediately

name: YOU_BLOCKED_USER
description: You blocked this user

name: RPC_TIMEOUT
description: Timeout of {ms} ms exceeded
